website_summaries.verdict: An all-rounder in our books; recommended for its low price and all-purpose utility.
pros: Great quality: breathable and hypoallergenic terrycloth, waterproof material, very affordable
cons: We dock points for its crinkling sound when shifting or moving around
Spills may pool on the cover

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased for our 3 year old son’s bed. He wears a pull up at night and sometimes it leaks a little. Even that small amount it leaks, will soak the sheet AND this mattress protector. When I lift the protector his mattress is wet below. I’m incredibly annoyed as his mattress is brand new. This has happened multiple times, and now we layer several different waterproof pads on top of it. We even had a vomiting episode and this cover helped zero. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Farris Family

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof :(
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof. We've had these for several months now and use them whenever a child is potty training or sick (stomach bugs), which isn't often but it's nice to have something that claims to prevent a wet mattress. These DO NOT work. So disappointed. In the thick of dealing with surprise illness and children throwing up in the night, I keep forgetting to throw these away and find something that works. I guess if you want a cheap pad (though not PADDED) this is your thing. Can't imagine why anyone would want these though.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work!  My Mattress is ruined!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially very impressed with this product. I really thought that it would do it's job while being more comfortable than the usual waterproof covers. Especially with so many great reviews! I was wrong. My young son crawled into our bed one night and I woke up to that dreaded warm, wet feeling. We immediately stripped the bed, but it was too late. My $2000 icomfort mattress was wet down to the foam. I spent the next day researching ways to clean memory foam mattresses. I was able to wash the outer cover and neutralize/clean the foam with a vinegar solution but the foam is permanently stained. Don't waste your money... or your mattress...
customer_reviews.author: jtkemeyer

customer_reviews.title: You never know when you'll need it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a life saver! We had a female cat that ( for some cat reason) decided to pee on our bed. It took a couple times of it happening before i bought this. It's soooo much easier to take this off the bed and theow it in the wash than it is to try and clean that smell out of a mattress. It fits our queen easily and doesnt have that "crinkly" sound everyone hates. The cat is done with her dramatic incidents, but this will remain on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Honest and Helpful

customer_reviews.title: We had been happy with the mattress protector and recommended to lots of ...
customer_reviews.text: We had been happy with the mattress protector and recommended to lots of friends until this morning. My 3-year old daughter accidentally peed when she was sleeping and I found that the mattress covered with the protector was also wet. It was absolutely our first time experience for the past 2 years and I went crazy! Then I also found out that the protector had gotten so thinner after 2 year use and had some small holes which are hardly seen with eyes. It is in the washer now but I think I will try a different brand this time. (The store has offered a replacement or a refund under the 10-year warranty)
customer_reviews.author: Reiko

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We got this mattress protector during the later part of my pregnancy (in case my water broke), and I was a little apprehensive of buying a mattress protector because I thought they would all be uncomfortable and noisy...but not this one!!! I can't even tell there is a mattress protector on the mattress!! . I've already had the baby and still keep the mattress protector on to protect the mattress. It is a great value and fits out bed perfectly. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawna

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product...comes with clear cleaning instructions, fits the mattress well, and does not feel like a rubber or plastic sheet at all. Comfortable under the bottom sheet and noiseless too! We poured a whole cup of warm water on it and it did not run off the sides or get the foam mattress underneath even damp! I have only had it for a week, but all is wonderful so far!
customer_reviews.author: Briana S.

customer_reviews.title: I just purchased this and will be sending it back ...
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this and will be sending it back. It sleeps too hot for me. I've seen others comment on here that this doesn't sleep hot at all. 2 things: I sleep hotter than most people so take that with a grain of salt; but, it's got a layer of polyurethane, which is essentially plastic. So it does indeed trap heat in any way you slice it. I think going forward, I'll be looking for a 100% cotton mattress cover.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Protects against cat pee
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because we have a "problem cat" going through some anxiety issues: she was periodically marking her territory by peeing on the bed. The one time she did this after we bought the mattress protector, I didn't discover it for at least 4-6 hours after she had peed. I say this to emphasize how completely the protector worked: none of the pee got through to the next layer, 2" memory foam on top of the mattress. Needless to say, we were very impressed and grateful. So we bought a second one, to have on hand whenever the first one has to be laundered.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have allergies to dust and was told a mattress protector would help. It absolutely does! It was a game changer for me. It also helps against sweat stains. Child has also peed on the bed and it didn't stain the mattress. Helps to keep your mattress looking good and also helps if you have allergies. Easy to clean, just put in the washer and dryer. I have one for each bed in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Laura T.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit 100%
customer_reviews.text: The protector part didn't cover the bed 100%. There are areas on the bed about 10-15% on the sides not protected from soil. I will try to update with a picture. Also it is too tight, I had to pull tight to cover the bed. Still haven't got any accidents by my pet to do a soil test :-)
customer_reviews.author: Swaminathan Sivasubramanian

customer_reviews.title: Great product--soft surface, but completely waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I got almost instant proof that I got a good purchase. I ordered this waterproof mattress protector when I was expecting an extended. visit from my daughter, son-in-law, and in-the-middle-of-potty-training grandson. I put the mattress protector on the bed they'd be using to see if it would fit. It did--and as advertised it has a soft, terry-cloth surface. I wondered if it would hold and went about cleaning the room, leaving a bottle of all purpose spray cleaner on the bed. It tipped over and leaked all over the bed. But, yes indeed, the mattress itself was absolutely dry. So. As advertised--soft, comfortable top that doesn't crinkle like a regular plastic sheet. More important. Completely waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: P. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mattress protector I will buy. I initially bought 1 for my child while she was potty training. I loved it and will never buy anything else. In the past, I have had mattress protectors that are stiff and and slip off the mattress continually. This protector holds tight to the mattress and is very soft and cushy on the top. It's a great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Meggan

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: so i read all the glowing reports on this but im not sold. its quite thin compared to the one it replaced. it fits my waterbed mattress fine just not happy with the construction of it Update: recommend not using on a waterbed this sweats between the mattress and the vinyl of this product making a really nasty damp feel and almost moldy look to it .yes it has been laundered regularly that’s not the problem I’m removing this didn’t really care for it in the first place but now I really don’t like it
customer_reviews.author: Savvy shopper

customer_reviews.title: deep pockets
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't crinkle. Pockets nice and deep, material of pockets like netting, makes it easy to stretch and tuck under. I use because I sweat a lot, sheet gets really wet. I can soak through even blankets. I tried once with 5 layers of pillowcases and soaked through them all. Want to save mattress. This makes me feel relaxed that I'm not going to get my mattress all wet with sweat. Because of sides being netting, this does tend to wrinkle esp in center. Hard to pull fi rm because netting gives.
customer_reviews.author: review

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I used this mattress cover for an emergent need in an elderly uncle who suddenly became incontinent of urine and ruined his mattress. After buying a new mattress and shielding it with the Hanna Kay Mattress Protector it was immediately put to the test the first night! It worked perfectly! It was able to absorb a night of urinary incontinence. We immediately washed it according to the instructions and it was ready for duty! He was fitted with adult diapers and now we have the assurance of an excellent back up should any accidents/failures occur. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Louis B.

customer_reviews.title: No Crunchy pad here!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this cover in anticipation of my young niece coming to visit (still has accidents). I hadn't yet gotten a mattress cover for my brand new queen size but I was concerned that this one would "sound crunchy" and be good only for the nieces visits ... But i found I was concerned needlessly. This is soft and none of my other guests have any ideas it's a water proof pad! It's a generous fit for my mattresses and it wraps right under and around very nicely. Great buy for a great price, and I don't need to buy a second cover!
customer_reviews.author: M. Clay

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased and have actually bought one for each mattress
customer_reviews.text: I was slightly concerned when I noted the initial thin appearance of this product. But I have been pleasantly surprised. While lightweight, the material is VERY rugged. It serves it's purpose well. My child has already spilled a Gatorade on it. No staining to the pad or mattress underneath. An additional bonus I discovered while washing is that it's lightweight thickness allowed me to wash it with a partial laundry load unlike the bulkier one it was replacing. I'm pleased and have actually bought one for each mattress.
customer_reviews.author: T B

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. I ordered this based on the numerous positive reviews and I regret my purchase. This is a VERY thin terry-cloth like fabric, and the stretchy sides feel very cheap and thin. I do not expect this to last long at all. It does have that plastic-y feel, so it probably will serve its purpose in protecting my mattress from spills, but thats the only nice thing I can say about it. My suggestion, spend a few extra dollars for something a bit better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: You don't know it's there until you need it
customer_reviews.text: Soft, doesn't make any crinkly sound, doesn't make the bed hot. An excellent protector. I have purchased 2 of them. One I have had for over 2 years and one just purchased. I can't speak to how effective the waterproofing is as there haven't been any accidents of any kind. Still, I have to believe it's got to be much better than a traditional mattress pad. I would be careful to follow the washing and drying instructions - cold or warm water, low heat drying, no bleach. Hot water, bleach, high heat drying are very likely to break down the waterproof layer.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Q. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste money on expensive mattress retailer bed covers. These are great!
customer_reviews.text: We have put this on all of our beds and they work great! It is especially good for our daughter's bed wetting. We have a couple spares for her room in case there is a multi-occurrance in the same night. Those have been washed and washed and washed and still not one trace of anything on the actual mattress. Have been WELL WORTH the money. DON'T buy over priced mattress covers from mattress stores. They will charge you up to $100+ and insist that you must have theirs to fully protect your bed. So far, the Hanna Kay cover has worked perfectly and saved us a ton of money on the 3 beds in the house.
customer_reviews.author: franzcatch

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Bought for my Child’s bed. Fit is good. Entire top is waterproof. Side elastic holds good so far. Side is NOT waterproof, so it may not completely protect the mattress if your kid gets a stomach bug. ‘Nuff said. Terry cloth top not top notch, but not bad either. Pills somewhat when laundered. Noisier than some reviews would suggest, but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this, but...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, but...it didn't work. I bought it for my son's new "big boy" bed. I was really happy with it when it arrived, it seemed like it was well made. I also liked that it was soft and quiet. However, he's had two accidents in the week we've used it (he's been sick), and this did not protect his mattress either time. It seemed to soak up quite a bit of the urine, but his mattress was noticeably wet both times. I have a changing table pad underneath it now until I get a better product. Kind of bummed, as this seemed like a quality product, and had great reviews :(
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Complete Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this as I need it. I have an 11 year old special needs child who isn't potty trained (we are trying). This was literally on my bed for 2 hours and he managed to soak through it onto my mattress. I have asked Amazon for a refund so hopefully they do the right thing so I can buy one that really works. Notice this picture says "waterproof". If it's only water resistance they should say that because it's definitely NOT waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has fabric topper that doesn't cause the bed to feel hot, it breathes so is cooler.
customer_reviews.text: The mattress that this was for was plastic on the top, we had word that the individuals using it were getting very hot and sweating at night. they were very uncomfortable. I had hoped that the fabric on this would insulate the body from the plastic and thereby correct the heat problem. I was told that the fabric on this kept the bed cool and no more problems existed. Good job.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K. Abshire

customer_reviews.title: This protector is both easy to wash and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This protector is both easy to wash and easy to use. I personally appreciate the polyurethane bottom layer, which protects my mattress against leaks and stains without the annoying plastic sound or feeling of vinyl covers. Additionally, the unique knit sides are extra large, allowing the cover to fit on almost any size mattress. I have purchased two twin sizes and one queen size. If you are in the market for a new mattress, I highly recommend the Comfort Shield Terry Waterproof Mattress Protector.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE MATTRESS PADS.
customer_reviews.text: Have two queen-size ones for my own bed, I got the twin-size for my twin airbed we got for my mother-in-law while she's visiting. I LOVE THESE MATTRESS PROTECTORS!! Easy to put on, giant corners (they went over the whole 15" air mattress!), comfortable, can't even tell it's there, and 100% waterproof. This one did not actually get tested on the waterproof-ness, but I have twin two-year-olds, a four-year-old, and a dog, and the other two have proven their worth. Bodily fluids, drinks, foods-- nothing gets through this thing. LOVE IT. Oh, and machine washable and dryable.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna K. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Bed saver
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 year old so every mattress in our house has one of these on it's a life saver if this wasn't on our mattresses we'd be in trouble protects against all accidental juice/ milk spills and even the occasional bed wetting accident highly recommend if you have children
customer_reviews.author: Nayeli

customer_reviews.title: Not breathable
customer_reviews.text: Not breathable at all. I didn't need something "waterproof" I didn't think, until the rubbery non-breathability of this thing made me sweat all night. Terrible product and unfortunately not eligible for return, so it's a complete waste of money. It's possible mine was defective based on all the positive reviews (which is why I bought it), but even putting my mouth directly on it with my hand on the other side I can't force any air through at all.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress protector
customer_reviews.text: Thin, terry cloth covered mattress cover. Works perfectly, not "loud" on the bed at all. I have a toddler and a dog both prone to accidents. It has saved the mattress already when tested. I will probably purchase another one to replace a more expensive cover that is more plush, but has leaked when tested. Easy to wash and dry. I paid full price for the product. Unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: The friction between protector and sheets ripped my sheets in multiple places
customer_reviews.text: So I got this mattress protector just in case I my waters break at night. I asked my cleaning lady to take of my old protector and put this one on and new sheets on ( I do not bleah my sheets and this set wasn’t old) with in few 2-3 nights our sheets got ripped in few different places. Can’t return the protector can’t get refund it wasn’t expensive but I need new protector and sheets
customer_reviews.author: Justyna Turek

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I got the king size and it fits my bed great. I got it because I have an epileptic cat that will wet herself during seizures. So far no seizures on the bed, but I did pour a cup of water on it to make sure it was water proof when I got it. It washed well but due to the waterproof layer is a bit of a pain to dry. I have to resituate it every so often. I do dry on low heat. I don't wash it very often to preserve the water proof layer but I was that sheets I put over it very regularly. This one doesn't crinkle and doesn't cause me to sleep hot.
customer_reviews.author: Fairy

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress protector.
customer_reviews.text: Covers the mattress perfectly. The terry top has a nice feel to it and does not "rustle" under use. It's a nice protector at a good price. I haven't tested the waterproof aspect yet, but I did purchase it because the rv mattress it tops is under a vent, so I worried that it could leak someday onto the mattress. It does say in cannot be washed with bleach. It should also be dried on low heat since the waterproof layer might get damaged. Not a problem if you read the directions before using.
customer_reviews.author: DHRiley

customer_reviews.title: two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I was super happy with my purchase. It came really fast & is a great quality product. Its not to bulky like some other brands Ive tried. Also its not "plastic" sounding when you lay on the bed. So great for when guests come over....you don't need to get embarrassed Or even take it off the bed. Just put on new sheets & your good to go. Fits really nicely on our bed & we have deep corners our bed. It washes really nicely as well.
customer_reviews.author: Apple Annie

customer_reviews.title: Seems just right--hope we never test the waterproof protection!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover was bought for our guest bedroom. I didn't want anything that would not fit correctly, would sound crinkly, or that we were really concerned. This cover fit the bill. It is lightweight, soft, and fit the mattress beautifully. It had good, big pockets. We haven't had to test the waterproof qualities and hopefully we never will, but I was pleased enough with it for this bed that I think I may get another when I have to replace our mattress cover.
customer_reviews.author: Third Age Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Nice product-recommend
customer_reviews.text: This item came right away, and it was packaged neatly-not too hard to get open and not too much trash for the landfill. It doesn't have a chemical smell, and the cover is nice and generous so none of that "the mattress is about to explode" problem with the corners. I have an old small dog that sleeps with me who is sometimes incontinent so I have to have a mattress cover at all times. It works very well and is easy to launder. It's a keeper. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer P Parke

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected and more.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Hanna Kay Premium 100% Waterproof Mattress Protector a few months ago. I am really pleased. I wish they had this years ago. It is not fat and bulky. It does not make you swear and it stays on the bed. Actually it is so perfect you will never know it is under your sheet. I also read another review that said that it makes noise. Mine did when I first put it on the bed. However, I just check for that issue and it does not make noise now. Maybe there is a break in period. It is very comfortable. I would buy this product again and I will recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: REAL REVIEW

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and soft feel. Not like the plasticy ones that feel like your sliding around on a diaper all night!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding mattress pad. We had one for 10 years, and just replacing it as it's a little stained! Great quality and soft feel. Not like the plasticy ones that feel like your sliding around on a diaper all night! This is soft and fits large Tempurpedics great.
customer_reviews.author: SuzanneDel

customer_reviews.title: this protector is great. We mainly bought it because we have Yorkies ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to protect our new sleep number bed as they want a few hundred dollars for their brand name cover (no thanks). For the price, this protector is great. We mainly bought it because we have Yorkies and well lets just say, things happen... We've had a few vomits and it's protected our bed every time. We wash it occasionally and don't see any deterioration in the material. When this one gets old we'll definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Speed

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: The mattress cover is terry cloth on one side and a thin rubber type material on the underside. It easily fits deep mattresses. We have a deep queen mattress and there is plenty of material to completely cover the mattress top and fold under the mattress allowing a good fit. My husband and I both have allergies so I was concerned about odors but we haven't experienced any problems. I washed the cover as instructed before putting it on our bed. I would recommend this product to any of my friends or family that was looking for a good mattress cover.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie from GA

customer_reviews.title: it fits to the tee and knowing it's 100% guarantee helps a great deal. The price is even great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased it for our guest bedroom and I have to say, it fits to the tee and knowing it's 100% guarantee helps a great deal. The price is even great. If I knew it was cheaper than what we bought for our master bedroom, I would have gotten this a long time ago. Oh, well, lesson learned. Thank you for providing a great quality item. The waterproof part, we won't know until someone spills something...review at a later date, but I'm hoping nothing gets spilled on it.
customer_reviews.author: Vibeone2002

customer_reviews.title: Great price, Item just as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Prompt shipment, great price. Item just as promised. HypoAllergenic Waterproof Mattress protector on one side, and a very smooth-low cut-Terry Cloth on the top side. Never noticed a thing as we slept last night, no noise, no fuss. There was no bunching or pulling either, as the deep pockets easily covered the Queen size mattress, and never tangled with the sheets. We just never noticed they were there, which I think is the best thing you can say about a Mattress Protector, that it is pretty invisable. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: R.-Lorraine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this mattress pad!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this mattress pad for a very long time. I use this one both on our home bed and in our motorhome. We have two dogs that love to snuggle with us in the early morning and I feel comfortable knowing if they should have a problem our mattress will not be stained. I use this pad under a more plush mattress pad. Therefore, it is not near our bodies, no heat, no crinkle noise. I would say a YES to anyone wanting to protect their mattress. The cost was low compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybugm

customer_reviews.title: I like how this barely makes any noise at all
customer_reviews.text: I like how this barely makes any noise at all. It does not sound like vinyl or plastic at all. It definitely is waterproof. I got this because I have a cat who seems to want to urinate on my bed. The urine does not get through this mattress pad at all. Furthermore, when I directly spray the mattress pad with urine cleaning spray it does not go through the material at all. Just make sure you read the cleaning instructions. The only reason I'm not giving it a 5 is because it's new and I don't know how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not waterproof!!!!! I’m so very disappointed. My potty training boys now have ruined mattresses. I will be contacting about the warranty and see if they stand by it. I’ve always washed it on the delicate cycle and hung dry, so I know it’s not user error.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Y.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this protector for a week or so, but it held up in the initial wash (follow care instructions!) and I have even noticed it since because there is zero crinkling. It's very breathable and doesn't make me sweat bullets like other protects have.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: Really does protect your mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It is the third one I purchase. I have two I bought for myself because I have one on my mattress at all times. When one is in the washer I put the other one on my mattress. This has helped keep my mattress in like new condition. Even with a dog sleeping on it every single day! My mattress has no stains or smells and it is almost 5 years old. The third one I purchased for my mom who just bought a new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product and mattress protection.
customer_reviews.text: First of all let me say that this order was received quickly (Prime member!) and the packaged in protective plastic bag within the Amazon box. The mattress protector is perfect with two small pets (who might have an accident) and frequent guests. Deep corner pockets, smooth stretchy sides and soft fine terry material top make this an easy to fit on any queen size mattress. I was afraid that the waterproof liner would feel plastic or hot but not at all. I highly recommend this product for anyone looking for an easy to wash and easy to use waterproof mattress protector.
customer_reviews.author: Gilgomez

customer_reviews.title: Did not protect our mattress
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this protector for 3 years. It was tested for the first time today when our dog peed on the bed, and the protector failed miserably. The pee soaked right through and into the mattress. Wishing we had invested in a higher quality protector.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: It is a thin and breathable mattress protector. But with breathable, waterproof went out the window. I want to warn that this is NOT a waterproof mattress protector. My son is 4 and I got this to protect his mattress, he didn't have an accident fort he first two months and had a hard sleep and now there is a urine stain on the brand new mattress that I bought this to protect from. His toddler mattress pad is now used on top of this one for any future mishaps. Do NOT buy this is you want something waterproof or you will be disappointed. Otherwise it is as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t protect against fluid
customer_reviews.text: My daughter’s diaper leaked and got pee on the sheets. Cleaned her up and took the sheets off and put them in the washing machine and came back in my room to change myself and I still smelled her pee. It was on the mattress. This so called mattress protector does not protect against fluid. Now I have to find a way to get pee out of a mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Rawls

customer_reviews.title: Hanna Kay Permium 100% Waterproof Mattress Cover
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my first mattress cover several months ago. I have a 10 year old beagle that gets up on the bed from time to time, she is epileptic and had a seizure while on the bed one day and wet the mattress. I decided to put this pad on our bed to protect the mattress. Hanna Kay Premium Waterproof cover stays in place. I ordered a second cover a couple of weeks ago to put on on our bed in a travel trailer. I recommend this item and will make sure my granddaughter has one on her bed once she is out of her crib.
customer_reviews.author: Cruelladevll

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this item as much as the other reviewers did
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector did not work for me at all. If it's waterproof, it's because of all my sweat from it not being breathable at all. I tried to sleep on it, but it changed the feel of the mattress for me, and I thought maybe I can just use it in the winter time or something. Now that it's cold, I decided to try it again, and didn't tell my girlfriend I put it back on the mattress. Neither of us slept well at all and felt like the protector made everything very hot (get your mind out of the gutter). Everyone else's reviews made this item seem fantastic for the price, but I just can't sleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mattress protector on my mother's bed for about 3 months now and can attest that it is definitely waterproof. My 89-year-old mother suffers from dementia and has incontinence issues. This mattress cover has saved her mattress on numerous occasions and has made my caregiving job just a little easier. I use the mattress cover under her regular bed sheets, and it fits very well. It has been about 3 months now and it is holding up well. This is a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: weed wacker

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! We have not had to find out if ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We have not had to find out if it works (yet), but I have to admit, this thing is pretty awesome. The top layer is a terry cloth type material with a very thin membrane underneath. It makes almost no noise when crumpled up or rolled over on. The size that I ordered (full), fit perfectly on my 8 inch mattress, but it could fit a deeper one, as there was room on the sides to allow for deeper mattresses. I will update, if it ever gets tested, but so far, I love this purchase!! No more plastic-y or vinyl lined protectors for me!
customer_reviews.author: Bamgela

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, maybe? Urineproof definitely not!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress protector three years ago and am extremely disappointed to report tonight that my daughter's night time accident immediately soaked directly through the protector into the mattress. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Lin

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Feelings
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this before my daughter was born, expecting we would have all kinds of baby messes...so glad I bought this! This product has saved my mattress a number of times! The quality is great and has withstood a dozen washings so far, no problem. My only complaint is the material is obviously not breathable making it sooo hot to sleep at night. Not sure if this is an issue with all mattress protectors or just this one, but it was pretty miserable to sleep on this summer. I am going to have to find an alternative solution for the hotter months.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie&Arialle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector seems to be doing the trick. Day 2 after I put it on my brand new memory foam mattress both my kids wet my bed in their sleep. Ugh. That's what happens when you have two children under 3 years old. Anyway, the mattress was completely protected. The only complaint I have is that I had to run it through the rinse cycle twice after washing it because the soap didn't rinse out completely on the slick side of the protector the first time. All and all I am so glad I purchased this item.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree M. Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Hannah Kay Mattress Cover
customer_reviews.text: Great waterproof mattress pad cover. Has a cotton like layer on top so your sheets stay secure and don't slide all over the place. The vinyl is underneath. No noises from the vinyl every time you move around. And 100% waterproof it is. The nicest cover that I have purchased. Washes very well. Will definitely recommended this to all that need that extra protection. Will purchase again for our other beds.
customer_reviews.author: R. Poole

customer_reviews.title: Not good for me
customer_reviews.text: My old mattress protector became useless, and the reviews for this one gave me high hopes. Well, it got put to the test right away. I have a 4 year old who still pees the bed on occasion and likes to sneak into my bed at night, and he indeed peed the bed the first night I got this protector. His urine went through the protector and soaked my bed. Then he ended up having another accident a couple nights later and the same thing. Perhaps I got a lemon, but this thing has been useless for me.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier in TX

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to put on my 2.5yr old's "new" bed. Moved from toddler bed to full size and I wanted to protect the mattress from potty accidents. The fit seems a little large, but I'm not too worried about for now. The material is soft and is completely lined with a waterproofing barrier, which is what I wanted for a decent price. I was looking at department stores and other home stores the price is doubled or more. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good for light coverage
customer_reviews.text: I have seven of these (five twin, one full, and one queen) and have been satisfied with how they've protected mattresses during sicknesses and unexpected accidents. However, my little one recently soaked clear through the protector and onto her brand new mattress. I don't know why this time it didn't hold up, but now I'm wondering how safe all of the other beds are in an extreme case scenario. So, buyer beware, it isn't completely waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: mamak

customer_reviews.title: very affordable, very protect, very mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great product, does exactly what you'd want and at a lower price than some of the other mattress protectors listed on Amazon. The top is a soft cottony material whereas the bottom is a somewhat rougher material (think inside of a rain coat) that provides great confidence about the protector's waterproofness. + material breathes well enough that even in a Houston summer it doesn't make the bed stifling or hot. + Fitted edges are secure even on extra thick (>18") mattresses + kept mattress protected against night-time ooze from an uncovered scraped knee
customer_reviews.author: Justin Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Probably it is great for protecting against stains
customer_reviews.text: This product says that it protects against dust mites, however, I figured it would completely enclose the mattress, perhaps with a zipper, otherwise how could it make that claim? Anyway, after going back and reading the description, I missed the part that says it is a "fitted" piece, so I suppose that was my mistake. I think its mains function must be to protect against stains, not sure how it can fully keep allergens and dust mites from the mattress when the mattress is exposed on the bottom on not completely enclosed. Probably it is great for protecting against stains...
customer_reviews.author: Valerie/Marina del Rey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mattress protector!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful mattress protector. It keeps our mattress dry and is easy to wash and dry. We’ve also bought several others ones before- a few twin sized and queen sized ones. It definitely helped when our little ones had pee accidents or vomited at night- their mattresses never got wet. The only thing I wish the manufacturer did was to include the size on the sewn in label. After laundry day, it’s hard to see which is the queen and king sizes.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: We are really happy with this great mattress cover
customer_reviews.text: We are really happy with this great mattress cover. I love the soft terry cloth top. It fits really well on our mattress. It does not have much "excess" or loose material. I have had a couple covers in the past that were way too large and had a lot of excess that had to be tucked under the mattress and would loosen here and there, create bubbles on the bed, etc. This one fits right and stays put. It is a very nice cover. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: beccalam13

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof but doesn't feel like plastic.
customer_reviews.text: We've been buying these for three years and just bought our sixth one. We started when our oldest child transitioned from a crib to a bed and the pad perfectly protects the mattress without feeling at all plasticy. It's comfortable and has held up to tons of washing. It's also not too bulky (so it's easy to wash). We like them so much, we bought them for our bed and the guest room beds.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Hanna Kay Premium 100% Waterproof Mattress Protector
customer_reviews.text: I just received and washed this product. No special washing requirements - used med heat dryer and didn't over-do it. The cover fit easily over my regular mattress plus the 3 inch memory foam pad I have - even more easily than the cover which came with the mattress pad! The sleeping surface is a thick terrycloth, which adds a little plushness to my already comfy mattress pad. The first night it slept a bit warm, but I'll update after a few more nights. Overall happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: D Law

customer_reviews.title: Surprised how noisy this was compared to my last protector
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on all the positive reviews, so, I was surprised at how noisy this was. I've only had one mattress protector before, that I got from a furniture store, and it was very soft and made no no noise. This protector does have a soft terry surface, but under that, it sounds plastic-y. I found this to be annoyingly crinkly. I put it on the bed, put the fitted sheet over it... nope. Can't do it. Don't like it. I will try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: bettylion

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: My son is just out of diapers at night and he's understandably had a few accidents. Since I'm in an apartment it isn't always feasible to wash his sheets right away. I wanted an inexpensive (not cheap) mattress protector as a backup. This one has definitely been worth it! Never had a leak, despite some big accidents. It's not as thick as others that we have, but that wasn't a big deal to me. I actually bought a second for those nights he climbs in my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good?
customer_reviews.text: this is my first time buying a mattress protector, so i can't compare it to others. i haven't tried putting it to the test or anything, just gonna trust it for now. here are some facts: the top basically feels like a towel. the bed feels warmer with it on, which will be handy in winter but a bummer in summer. ikea sells similar products for less, but i don't know if they're the same quality. (for all i know they're better) it seems like it's deep enough to accommodate a mattress topper as well. i hope you have enjoyed this mattress protector review, citizen. carry on.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Overly plastic for me, works great for my kid.
customer_reviews.text: I can't stand the feel of this myself, but my special needs 9 year old leaves it alone and does well with it (she inherited our old king sized bed because she'd ruined four others in a year via various methods of excretion). She has shredded other mattress pads--we have two of this so that we can swap quickly if need be. She will even sleep on it without a sheet at times and do okay. I'd thought we'd use this on our new bed, but the feel was so rough and loud that I ended up getting one at costco. Little bit spendier, much better feel.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: This mattress cover works great to protect a twin futon from the occasional nighttime ...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover works great to protect a twin futon from the occasional nighttime pee accident from my young child. The top surface is sort of a lightweight towel terry cloth which would be nice against the skin if you wanted it there, but I think most people want a sheet on top of this. Works great, price is right, recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Phred

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this mattress cover.
customer_reviews.text: I got this cover on time and I was very pleased with it. My 4yr old son likes sleeping on my bed and as u can guess why happens to my bed but this mattress protector is a life saver. I still have to wash the bed covers time and again but I don't have to worry about the bed anymore. I'll definitely recommend this cover and I'm probably going to need another one just incase. Overall I'm happy with it. It's not hot, or heavy, machine washable just don't dry it on super hot air. Common sense :)
customer_reviews.author: OCMuM

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised it didn't zip all the way around and fully enclose the mattress. I guess I overlooked that so not the product's fault. I'm keeping them because I'm too lazy to do the exchange. The fabric is like a towel (terry cloth) fabric which also surprised me
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Material and stitch seem very durable and well put together ...
customer_reviews.text: Material and stitch seem very durable and well put together. It washed well and handled tumble-dry-low without melting or disintegrating (other protectors have done that do me in the past). It fit the mattress with a little extra material so it wasn't difficult to fit on.
customer_reviews.author: Moot Pt

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, comfortable, but stitching is ripping
customer_reviews.text: Good if better build quality as doesn't sleep hot even here in Phoenix, it doesn't crinkle, but the corners are already starting to rip after only three months of use :( disappointed in stitching quality. Wouldn't recommend as there's no point in paying $25 for a couple months use. Maybe I got a defect? Works well on my Purple mattress if stitching was stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mastson

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great cover which will protect the mattress in case one ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cover for a new memory foam mattress we bought for a sofa bed. It’s a great cover which will protect the mattress in case one of our grandchildren has a wetting incident overnight. It’s thin but strong and very flexible, like a sheet, perfect over a padded mattress pad & cover!
customer_reviews.author: Frances Hill

customer_reviews.title: I will buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this item. It arrived promptly, did not have an unpleasant smell, and was a great replacement for the prior mattress protector, which was made of that funny non-woven "fabric" and which did not hold up. This mattress protector feels much better made and fit the mattress well. I always put a mattress protector on every bed - keeps the dust mites out of the bedding. It was a nice surprise for my daughter's room when she got home from college this spring.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: Good option when your not looking to break the bank for a mattress protector. Though not as padded as some I've purchased in the past, it's terry material and the liner do the job without the crinkly sound.
customer_reviews.author: growworm

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a mattress pad/protector that had 4-corner elastic type straps to keep it in place - which it didn't. The mattress pad wandered around to match my tossing and turning, which means it routinely needed to be reset each morning. I was concerned buying this one as I have a typical Asian mattress about 8" high and no box spring. Would it fit? The design of this cover is such that it easily accommodates mattresses of various heights based on its wrap around design. It meets my needs and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Doug J

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: The cost is much higher than some similar products, but in my experience the cheaper options were of such poor quality that the plastic started to shred almost immediately, and they became totally unusable in less than a year. This brand holds up very well, and after a year of use seems to be just as strong as new. I use them inside out on my children's beds so that if there is a nighttime leak it won't soak into the cover. I would definitely purchase more of these in the future if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far there are no complaints. The protector was very easy to put on and with the very deep pockets we were able to successfully cover our thick mattress. It makes no noise and does not take away from the feel of our mattress, we actually can't tell that it's there. I cannot speak about how waterproof it is or not because I've not had an opportunity to test it. For the moment it satisfies our needs
customer_reviews.author: Assistant Fireball

customer_reviews.title: These are great! These protectors are soft and silent on the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! These protectors are soft and silent on the beds. I actually have the barrier side up on these so if there is an accident it just needs to be cleaned and disinfected rather than washing the whole protector, though they wash well, too. I have one on every bed in the house. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof at all
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this product. Toddler peed in her bed and it didn't protect the mattress at all. Disappointed since it had so many good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: JVH

customer_reviews.title: It's like not having one at all...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of these never having needed one in action until my little one wet the bed today. The urine went all the way through. There are no rips, tears, or any other sign of damage. Somehow the plastic underlayer is porous. And now these mattress protectors are headed to the trash. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: My cat got a uti and peed on the bed - soaked right through the mattress protector. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Draper

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely perfect! The very first week I had it
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect! The very first week I had it, little one wet the bed. Mattress was completely dry! Tossed cover in the wash and right back on and ready to go. I was also really surprised at how quiet it is, no crinkly noises. When I opened it , because of how quiet it was, I had my doubts it would work very well, but it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: clh

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF AT ALL!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new mattress protector for my bed because mine was not waterproof and my son is potty training. He comes to my bed in the middle of the night and he has peed in his sleep a couple of times. So last night he peed again which is annoying enough as is to get woken up by that but I thought at least I have the new mattress protector on so I won't need to deep clean my bed again. WRONG! It's not waterproof at all! Now we have to shampoo the bed again because there's a huge wet spot on my mattress. This is false advertising!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few months now, ever since I got into my third trimester of pregnancy, for fear I'd break my water on the bed. That didn't happen thank goodness, however I have had a baby on my bed for the last 5 months, and no leaks through to the mattress with this protector. At first it feels a bit weird to lay on, because it's slightly crunchy? Definitely a waterproof feature. Also, it feels a bit warmer than sleeping on the sheet alone, also due to the waterproof part of the protector.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C.

customer_reviews.title: Wash before using, product does not smell like others.
customer_reviews.text: The waterproof mattress protector is really well put together and fit my full sized bed very snug. However I would recommend that anyone who buys this product wash it first because it has a really off putting texture to it when you first get it. After washing it the off putting texture which feels sort of waxy went away and then it became fluffy as it is supposed to be. However before washing it read the instructions on the package so as to not shrink it. As for the smell of the product there is none, just incase anyone was wondering.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: As long as you're not stupid like me and dry it on high heat, you'll be fine!
customer_reviews.text: I really can't say much about a mattress protector. I'm happy with this purchase since it was less than half the price of the one I bought from the mattress store years ago and the quality is great. Just don't make the same mistake I did with my last mattress protector by drying it on high heat. ;-) Great quality and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Best Mattress Protector Ever
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this mattress protector twice for myself, twice for my brother and once for my mother. I’d say I’m a fan. My 5 year old has puked on our bed numerous times and we even had a kitten pee on our bed and nothing got through to the mattress! I love the price and this product can take a beating as I wash and dry it many times a month.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: The best mattress cover in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Had others before and was always disappointed - shrunk or shred at mattress corners. This one is just perfect and does the job perfectl(Have an oldcat who has sometimes "accidents" on the bed... Great product to recommend anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Europeans

customer_reviews.title: Louder than expected - do not recommend for couples
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my memory foam topper from sweat, and was not pleased with the noise it makes with any movement in the bed. The top surface is covered with terry cloth, but the underneath is like a vinyl tablecloth. My wife is waking up more often since we put it on, and I will probably change back to a traditional mattress pad. Other than the noise, I think the quality is good, and I will continue to use one on my son's bed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof tested
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's bed. We are currently potty training her. At first it smells like plastic but I air it out for a few days and the smell is gone. The top part is terry cloth and the other side is plastic material. It doesn't make any crinkle sound when she sleeps on it, so it doesn't bother her sleep. She wet her bed once and i didn't change the bed right away because i have to clean her up. The urine didn't leak. It is waterproof. All in all, we love this mattress protector.
customer_reviews.author: Adella

customer_reviews.title: i don't feel the cover under the sheet and this product seems perfectly fine for what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: i read all the reviews and went ahead and placed an order for both a king and queen size mattress cover. i have been sleeping on the king for a week and have not noticed any bunching or rippling. i was told by the mattress dealer to be sure to purchase a cover that is both breathable and waterproof. this one has both. i don't feel the cover under the sheet and this product seems perfectly fine for what i was looking for. so far, i am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: caradee

customer_reviews.title: Well Made - Generously Sized
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress protector to replace a flimsy one that was no longer usable. The instructions said to wash before use. It also said to machine dry which surprised me. I did as suggested and it washed and dried beautifully. It is generously sized so there is no need to stretch it to get it over th the mattress. It is light weight but seems strong and well made. So far I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: BJ2G

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these so far.
customer_reviews.text: We just got two of these and I really cannot say much yet except that I am very happy with the feel of the mattress pad and with the depth of the sides (so they will not slip off) and the quality seems very good. I just washed them and put them on the bed. They do seem thin, but from what I read, that is just the way they are because they have a super thin "special" waterproof membrane. They do not seem noisy or hot which is what I cannot stand in a waterproof mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: God Bless America

customer_reviews.title: They mattress protectors are well made and the terry cloth makes it unnecessary to use a traditional mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: I bought two mattress protectors for bunk beds for my grandchildren that are coming for the holidays.although they haven't slept on them. These are my observations. They mattress protectors are well made and the terry cloth makes it unnecessary to use a traditional mattress pad, although I did just to give it more padding. I wanted water protection without the crinkly feeling you hear and feel laying on plastic. After putting on the pad I laid on the bed and it felt good not like I was laying on a shower curtain .i am pleased to date.
customer_reviews.author: CG

product_meta.title: Hanna Kay Mattress Protector King Size
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1| Size:KingGet a restful night's sleep and prolong the life of your mattress by keeping it sanitary and safe from liquids, skin cells, mold, dust and other allergy triggers. Blocks Liquid Spills Once a liquid stain reaches your mattress, it is extremely difficult to remove, will probably void your mattress warranty, and may even make the mattress unusable. The Hanna Kay Mattress Protector can absorb up to 1 liter of urine, perspiration, water or any other fluid, thanks to a 100% cotton terrycloth top bonded onto a hypoallergenic polyurethane membrane. This safe, ultra-thin, noiseless material contains no PVCs or phthalates. Relieves Allergy, Asthma and Eczema Sufferers While you sleep, your body sheds skin cells and perspiration through the sheets and into your mattress. These substances become food for dust mites, bacteria, mold and fungus, all of which are a common causes of allergic and asthmatic reactions, as well as bed bugs. Dust mites are also known to cause eczema. The Hanna Kay Mattress Protector traps all those body particles on the surface, where they can be easily washed away. Breathable Comfort Microscopic holes in the membrane layer allow the mattress protector to circulate air, while still blocking out liquids and particles. This breathability helps dissipate body heat and maintain a comfortable sleeping temperature. The Hanna Kay Mattress Protector's advanced technology allows it to be as thin as a non-protective mattress cover, so the familiar feel of your bed won't change. Easy to Live With With elasticized mesh sides, the Hanna Kay Mattress Protector slips on as easily as a fitted sheet, and adapts to any mattress depth from 6" to 18". To clean it, simply toss it into the washing machine as you would any other mattress cover or sheet. The Hanna Kay Mattress Protector is made with premium quality materials and construction, and comes with a full replacement 10 year warranty.
feature_bullets: Fitted sheet style fits all mattress depths from 6" to 22"
Protects the mattress from all liquid stains, allergens, dust mites and bacteria (10 Year Warranty)
Breathable yet repels liquids through a revolutionary waterproof membrane
Ultra-thin with a cotton terry surface , will not change the feel of your mattress
Ideal for asthma, and allergy sufferers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,608 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
